[ library(eplex) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

EplexInstance:get_changeable_value(+Handle, ?Var, -Val)

Interface predicate to access the <EM>changeable</EM> value for this variable.
Handle
Handle to an eplex instance
Var
A solver problem variable for solver associated with EplexInstance
Val
The typed_solution value for this variable
